text: Barbara Brouwer (born 28 March 1993) is a Dutch korfball player. She is a member of DVO and the Netherlands national korfball team. With the national team she won the gold medal at the 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. ==Achievements== ===Club=== *Korfbal League champion, 3x (2016, 2017, 2018) *Korfball Europa Cup champion, 3x (2017, 2018, 2019) * champion, 2x (2012, 2015) * champion, 1x (2012) ===National team=== *World Games champion, 2x (2017, 2022) *World champion, 2x (2015, 2019) *European champion, 3x (2016, 2018, 2021) ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch korfball players Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (province) Category:Sportswomen
title: Barbara Brouwer
